per_frame_1=frame3 = frame%3;
per_frame_2=//wave_x = if(equal(frame3,0),0.25,if(equal(frame3,1),0.5,.75));
per_frame_3=//wave_y = if(equal(frame3,0),0.5,if(equal(frame3,1),0.5,0.5));
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=w = -time*1;
per_frame_6=w = sin(time*0.1)*4+sin(time*0.21618)*4;
per_frame_7=c = 0.2;//bass*0.1;
per_frame_8=px1 = 0.5+ c*sin(w);
per_frame_9=py1 = 0.5+ c*cos(w);
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=px2 = 0.5+ c*sin(w+1.0472*4);
per_frame_12=py2 = 0.5+ c*cos(w+1.0472*4);
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=px3 = 0.5+ c*sin(w+2.0944);
per_frame_15=py3 = 0.5+ c*cos(w+2.0944);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=wave_x = if(equal(frame3,0),px1,if(equal(frame3,1),px2,px3));
per_frame_19=wave_y = if(equal(frame3,0),py1,if(equal(frame3,1),py2,py3));
per_frame_20=//wave_y = -wave_y;
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=wave_r = 1;//if(equal(frame3,0),1,if(equal(frame3,1),0,0));
per_frame_23=wave_g = 1;//if(equal(frame3,0),0,if(equal(frame3,1),1,0));
per_frame_24=wave_b = 0;//if(equal(frame3,0),0,if(equal(frame3,1),0,1));
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=//wave_mystery = if(equal(frame3,0),(b7 - bass)*0.1 -0.5,if(equal(frame3,1),(m7 - mid)*0.1  -0.5,(t7 - treb)*0.1 -0.5));
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=b7 = b6;
per_frame_30=b6 = b5;
per_frame_31=b5 = b4;
per_frame_32=b4 = b3;
per_frame_33=b3 = b2;
per_frame_34=b2 = b1;
per_frame_35=b1 = bass;
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=m7 = m6;
per_frame_38=m6 = m5;
per_frame_39=m5 = m4;
per_frame_40=m4 = m3;
per_frame_41=m3 = m2;
per_frame_42=m2 = m1;
per_frame_43=m1 = mid;
per_frame_44=
per_frame_45=t7 = t6;
per_frame_46=t6 = t5;
per_frame_47=t5 = t4;
per_frame_48=t4 = t3;
per_frame_49=t3 = t2;
per_frame_50=t2 = t1;
per_frame_51=t1 = treb;
per_frame_52=
per_frame_53=q1 = (b1+b2+b3+b4+b5+b6+b7)/7;
per_frame_54=q2 = (m1+m2+m3+m4+m5+m6+m7)/7;
per_frame_55=q3 = (t1+t2+t3+t4+t5+t6+t7)/7;
per_frame_56=q9 = 1/aspectY;
per_frame_57=q10 = 1/aspectX;
per_pixel_1=x = 0.5 + (x-0.5)*q9;
per_pixel_2=y = 0.5 + (y-0.5)*q10;
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=w = sin(time*0.1)*4+sin(time*0.21618)*4;
per_pixel_5=y = 0.5 + (y-0.5)*0.75;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=d = 0.3 - (q1-bass)*0.05;
per_pixel_8=px1 = 0.5+ d*sin(w);
per_pixel_9=py1 = 0.5- d*cos(w);
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=d = 0.3 - (q2-mid)*0.05;
per_pixel_12=px3 = 0.5+ d*sin(w+1.0472*4);
per_pixel_13=py3 = 0.5- d*cos(w+1.0472*4);
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=d = 0.3 - (q3-treb)*0.05;
per_pixel_16=px2 = 0.5+ d*sin(w+2.0944);
per_pixel_17=py2 = 0.5- d*cos(w+2.0944);
per_pixel_18=
per_pixel_19=mx = (px1+px2+px3)/3;
per_pixel_20=my = (py1+py2+py3)/3;
per_pixel_21=
per_pixel_22=vx1 = px2 - px1;
per_pixel_23=vy1 = py2 - py1;
per_pixel_24=vx2 = x - px1;
per_pixel_25=vy2 = y - py1;
per_pixel_26=
per_pixel_27=c = 150-50*bass;
per_pixel_28=sigmoide = 1;
per_pixel_29=
per_pixel_30=
per_pixel_31=dir = acos((vx1*vx2+vy1*vy2)/(sqrt(vx1*vx1+vy1*vy1)*sqrt(vx2*vx2+vy2*vy2)))-1;
per_pixel_32=sigmoide = sigmoide/(1+pow(2,c*dir));
per_pixel_33=
per_pixel_34=vx1 = px3 - px2;
per_pixel_35=vy1 = py3 - py2;
per_pixel_36=vx2 = x - px2;
per_pixel_37=vy2 = y - py2;
per_pixel_38=
per_pixel_39=dir = acos((vx1*vx2+vy1*vy2)/(sqrt(vx1*vx1+vy1*vy1)*sqrt(vx2*vx2+vy2*vy2)))-1;
per_pixel_40=sigmoide = sigmoide*1/(1+pow(2,c*dir));
per_pixel_41=
per_pixel_42=vx1 = px1 - px3;
per_pixel_43=vy1 = py1 - py3;
per_pixel_44=vx2 = x - px3;
per_pixel_45=vy2 = y - py3;
per_pixel_46=
per_pixel_47=dir = acos((vx1*vx2+vy1*vy2)/(sqrt(vx1*vx1+vy1*vy1)*sqrt(vx2*vx2+vy2*vy2)))-1.2;
per_pixel_48=sigmoide = sigmoide/(1+pow(2,c*dir));
per_pixel_49=
per_pixel_50=
per_pixel_51=
per_pixel_52=cz = 0.05+bass*0.01;
per_pixel_53=cr = 0.02+treb*0.1;
per_pixel_54=
per_pixel_55=s1 = sigmoide+0.1*(q1-bass);
per_pixel_56=s2 = cr*(sigmoide+0.1*(q3-treb));
per_pixel_57=
per_pixel_58=dx = (sin(w))*0.05*(1-treb*0.5)*(sigmoide-0.5);//s2*sin(my-y) +(x-mx)*cz*s1;
per_pixel_59=dy = -(cos(w))*0.05*(1-treb*0.5)*(sigmoide-0.5);//-s2*sin(mx-x) +(y-my)*cz*s1;
per_pixel_60=
per_pixel_61=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret = ret- (ret*.5);
warp_8=`    ret = ret*(abs(GetBlur2(uv)-.5))*5;
warp_9=`    ret = ret - .01;
warp_10=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_rand00;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`ret = tex2D(sampler_rand00, frac(1-GetBlur2(uv).yx*0.6 + time*float2(0.057,.036)))
comp_5=`*(1+GetPixel(uv).x + GetBlur1(uv).y)*0.4;
comp_6=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_7=`                      ((uv.xyy
comp_8=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_9=`                      ).xyz*
comp_10=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_11=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.4 
comp_12=`                     );
comp_13=`if(ret.x+ret.y+ret.z<.7)ret += (noise2)*.5; 
comp_14=`
comp_15=`}
